独り: (ひとり) - (esp. 一人) one person; (ひとり only) (esp. 独り) alone/unmarried/solitary
独りきり: (ひとりきり) - all on one's own
独りごちる: (ひとりごちる) - to talk to oneself; to mutter
独りごと: (ひとりごと) - soliloquy; monologue; speaking to oneself
独りっきり: (ひとりっきり) - all on one's own
独りっ切り: (ひとりっきり) - all on one's own
独りで: (ひとりで) - alone; by oneself; voluntarily; spontaneously; automatically
独りでに: (ひとりでに) - by itself; automatically; naturally
独りよがり: (ひとりよがり) - complacent; self-satisfied; self-important; conceited
独り切り: (ひとりきり) - all on one's own
独り勝ち: (ひとりがち) - being the sole winner; winner-take-all
独り占い: (ひとりうらない) - divining one's own fortune
独り占め: (ひとりじめ) - monopolising; monopolizing; hogging; having all to oneself
独り合点: (ひとりがってん) - rash assumption; hasty conclusion
独り善がり: (ひとりよがり) - complacent; self-satisfied; self-important; conceited
独り天下: (ひとりでんか) - (yoji) being the sole master of the situation; reigning supreme; standing unchallenged
独り天狗: (ひとりてんぐ) - (yoji) self-conceited person; ego-tripper; swelled head
独り女: (ひとりおんな) - single woman; bachelor girl; spinster
独り旅: (ひとりたび) - travelling alone; solitary journey
独り暮らし: (ひとりぐらし) - a single life; a solitary life; living alone
独り歩き: (ひとりあるき) - walking alone; walking unaided; going alone; standing on one's own
独り決め: (ひとりぎめ) - arbitrary decision; taking for granted
独り相撲: (ひとりずもう) - (yoji) fighting (tilting at) windmills/working oneself up even though there really isn't anything to fight at; single-person mimicking a wrestling match
独り稽古: (ひとりげいこ) - practicing by oneself; self-instruction
独り立ち: (ひとりだち) - being independent; standing on one's own; becoming independent
独り笑い: (ひとりわらい) - laughing by oneself; erotic pictures/shunga
独り者: (ひとりもの) - single (i.e. unmarried) person; someone alone
独り舞台: (ひとりぶたい) - (yoji) performing solo (by oneself); having the stage to oneself; being in sole command; eclipsing (outshining) the others; field of activity in which one is unrivaled (unrivalled)
独り芝居: (ひとりしばい) - one-person show; one-woman show; one-man show; performing solo; monodrama
独り言: (ひとりごと) - soliloquy; monologue; speaking to oneself
独り言ちる: (ひとりごちる) - to talk to oneself; to mutter
独り言つ: (ひとりごつ) - to talk to oneself; to mutter
独り負け: (ひとりまけ) - being the only loser; losing by oneself
独ソ不可侵条約: (どくソふかしんじょうやく) - Treaty of Non-Aggression between Germany and the Soviet Union/German-Soviet Nonaggression Pact
独仏: (どくふつ) - Germany and France; German-French
独仏戦争: (どくふつせんそう) - Franco-German War (i.e. the Franco-Prussian War, 1870-1871)
独創性に富む: (どくそうせいにとむ) - to be ingenious
独占: (dokusen) - monopólio, monopolização, exclusividade; monopolizando, guardando só para si
独占インタビュー: (どくせんインタビュー) - exclusive interview
独占事業: (どくせんじぎょう) - monopolistic enterprise; monopoly
独占企業: (どくせんきぎょう) - monopoly business, enterprise
独占会見: (どくせんかいけん) - exclusive interview
独占権: (どくせんけん) - exclusive license; exclusive right (to)
独占欲: (どくせんよく) - desire to monopolize; desire to monopolise
独占的競争: (どくせんてききょうそう) - monopolistic competition
独占禁止政策: (どくせんきんしせいさく) - antitrust policy
独占禁止法: (どくせんきんしほう) - antitrust law; Antitrust Act
独参: (どくさん) - private interview with a Zen Master
独参湯: (どくじんとう) - crowd-puller; box-office certainty
独古: (どっこ) - single-pronged vajra/tokko/dokko/copper or iron implement, pointed at both ends, used in esoteric Buddhist rituals; cloth of a tokko pattern
独吟: (dokugin) - solo vocal; recitação solo de poesia tradicional, verso noh, etc.
独壇場: (どくだんじょう) - (word borne of confusion between the kanji 擅 and 壇)  field in which one acts unchallenged; unrivaled sphere of activity (unrivalled); one's monopoly
独女: (ひとりおんな) - single woman; bachelor girl; spinster
独居房: (どっきょぼう) - single-person cell; solitary confinement
独往: (どくおう) - going on one's own or one's own way
独我論: (どくがろん) - solipsism; philosophical idea that nothing outside of one's own mind really exists
独房: (どくぼう) - single cell; isolation cell
独房監禁: (どくぼうかんきん) - solitary confinement
独擅場: (どくせんじょう) - field in which one acts unchallenged; unrivaled sphere of activity (unrivalled); one's monopoly
独文: (どくぶん) - German literature; German sentence
